user_query: I want to start a climate change blog. Can you give me the latest news about climate change from all over the world? Additionally, provide me with the most popular combinations of keywords related to climate change and the corresponding number of news agencies and articles. Moreover, fetch the timeline of the 100 most recent articles and their keywords.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest news articles about climate change from various global news sources.
Analyze the news articles retrieved in step 1 to find the most popular combinations of keywords related to climate change, along with the number of news agencies and articles covering those keywords.
Compile a timeline of the 100 most recent articles about climate change using the data from step 1, including their respective keywords.
